title: Otmar Hoefer
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221225455/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Font Retailers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221225455/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%20Retailers) : Otmar Hoefer**

Otmar Hoefer is the Director of Font Marketing at [Linotype Library](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221225455/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Linotype%20Library).

In the late 1970s, while he was still a college student, Hoefer began working at [D. Stempel AG](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221225455/http:/typophile.com/wiki/D.%20Stempel%20AG) as a printing technician. After [Mergenthaler-Linotype GmbH](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221225455/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Mergenthaler-Linotype%20GmbH) acquired D. Stempel AG, Hoefer remained with the company, eventually ending up in the marketing department.

Hoefer is very active as a volunteer with the [Klingspor Museum](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221225455/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Klingspor%20Museum). Hoefer also raises donkeys and mules in his spare time.

Hoefer is the son of the famed calligrapher and type designer [Karlgeorg Hoefer](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221225455/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Karlgeorg%20Hoefer).

Please note that, although the German o umlaut (ö) may also be written out as "oe", Hoefer's name is _actually_ spelled with an oe and not an ö!
author: dan_reynolds
